page.title: 09Allington Village
page.content: In Allington there is one{church dedicated to{St John}the Baptist.There are four houses being built and a barn conversion has just been finished. There is also a bungalow being built on the road to{Amesbury.}There is a {general stores }which sells most things and it is also a post office, up stairs there is a flat which you can rent. There is a pub called{the {Old Inn}on the{A338}main road. At {Allington chapel}on Sundays Mr and Mrs Newman run a{Sunday school}.On Mondays and wednesdays little children go to a playgroup at the chapel.The biggest house in{Allington}is called{Allington {house}owned by Mr and Mrs Glanville.There is a chalk pit which is mostly filled in with soil.There is a garage which sells petrol and other things. by{KEVIN WILLIS}
